description: Booking direct has its perks. When you book directly with The Frederick Hotel, we’ll give you a $25 American Express Card for each night you stay with us, up to $200 to spend around NYC, perfect for a meal on us or few drinks in the greatest city in the world.
perk_list: In addition to your $25 AMEX Card, other perks of The Frederick Hotel include:
perks_list:
In addition to your $25 AMEX Card, other perks of The Frederick Hotel include:

  • Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hotel
  • Frette linens
  • Concierge services
  • Valet parking

  • Serafina, Starbucks and Pret A Manger on premises
